tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patents (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_number VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    product_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    patent_owner VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    filing_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    filing_date DATE,
    owner VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE products (
    product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(100),
    patent_id UUID REFERENCES patents(patent_id),
    launch_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE patent_owners (
    owner_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name VARCHAR(100),
    headquarters_address VARCHAR(255),
    contact_email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE patents ( 
    patent_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    patent_title TEXT NOT NULL, 
    patent_date DATE, 
    patent_owner TEXT, 
    product_name TEXT, 
    product_category TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE inventors ( 
    inventor_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    inventor_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
    inventor_country TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE companies ( 
    company_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    company_name TEXT NOT NULL, 
    company_location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patent_ownerships ( 
    ownership_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
    patent_id INT REFERENCES patents(patent_id), 
    company_id INT REFERENCES companies(company_id), 
    percentage_owned DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE patents (
    patent_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patent_title VARCHAR(255),
    patent_description TEXT,
    filing_date DATE,
    inventor_name VARCHAR(100)
);
